disclaimer: The following information is provided for general informational purposes only. For any construction or legal matters, please consult a certified professional.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with a wide entryway and tactile guiding lines following Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Features a foyer designed to welcome guests.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Scandinavian minimalist design, natural light through large windows, incorporating an open plan layout that connects to the central courtyard and adjacent balcony. Designed for luxury aesthetics with accessibility considerations.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living area, featuring a retractable table design to maximize floor space while ensuring wheelchair maneuverability and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Wide door with lever handles, compliant with local accessibility norms.

openings.name: Central Courtyard Access
openings.description: Large glass sliding doors providing a seamless transition to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxury bedroom with built-in wardrobe, Scandinavian minimalist design emphasizing functionality. Features a spacious balcony offering panoramic views and accessibility for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Bedroom
rooms.description: Open studio space designed to double as a secondary bedroom or creative workspace. Incorporates modern furniture layouts and a dedicated wheelchair-accessible bathroom area adjacent to the room.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Accessible sliding door with a built-in ramp leading to the balcony, ensuring ease of movement and safety.

openings.name: Private Bathroom
openings.description: Direct access from each bedroom, designed with grab bars, adjustable fixtures, and ample space for maneuverability.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room featuring Scandinavian design elements and a private balcony. The layout is optimized for wheelchair accessibility with easy-to-navigate space.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Room/Workspace
rooms.description: Adaptable space that can serve as an office, entertainment area, or additional storage. Incorporates Vastu-aligned positioning and Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.name: Guest Balcony
openings.description: Small, accessible balcony designed for privacy while offering views of the courtyard.

openings.name: Service Elevator
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible elevator to ensure movement between floors complies with accessibility standards.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open-air central courtyard acting as a natural light well and ventilation shaft. Features landscaping, seating areas, and integrated water features following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Terrace
rooms.description: Spacious terrace area overlooking the living spaces, designed with Scandinavian simplicity for outdoor relaxation while ensuring safe accessibility.
